class.name: FABRIK3D
class.brief_description: Position based forward and backward reaching inverse kinematics solver.
class.description: [FABRIK3D] is position based IK, allowing precise and accurate tracking of targets. It's ideal for simple chains without rotation constraints. The result twist around forward vector will always be [code]0[/code]. [b]Note:[/b] When the target is close to the root, it tends to produce zig-zag patterns, resulting in unnatural visual movement. Also with limitations, unreachable targets may cause oscillations and unstable results.
